data.title: All about Iron Resurrection's Amanda Martin: Age, net worth, husband and children
data.meta_description: Amanda Martin rose to stardom after being featured on Iron Resurrection with her husband and other actors. How much do you know about her personal life?
data.text:
Amanda Martin is a television star, business owner, and former top banking executive. She features on Discovery Channel's reality series Iron Resurrection, alongside her husband and other castmates. She co-owns the custom vehicle building and fabrication company named Martin Bros Customs.

TABLE OF CONTENTS

Profile summary

Who is Amanda Martin?

How old is Amanda Martin?

Family background

Educational background

Career

Is Iron Resurrection still in business?

Is Iron Resurrection coming back in 2024?

Marriage and children

Iron Resurrection's Amanda Martin's brush with cancer

Are Shorty and Joe Martin still friends?

What happened to Amanda Martin?

Height and weight

Trivia

Amanda Martin is the co-owner of Martin Bros Customs, a custom vehicle building and fabrication company. The first season of Iron Resurrection aired in 2016. The show has continued on the Discovery Channel to date. Read on to learn more about her, including her age, family background, career, marriage, and children.

Profile summary

Full nameAmanda Jill KeathleyGenderFemaleDate of birth11 December 1973Age50 years (as of August 2024)Place of birthRed Oak, Texas, United States of AmericaCurrent residenceJohnson City, Texas, United States of AmericaNationalityAmericanEthnicityWhiteZodiac signSagittariusReligionChristianitySexualityStraightHeight5 ft 8 in (173 cm)Weight143 lb (65 kg)Hair colourBlondeEye colourBrownMarital statusMarriedSpouseJoe MartinFatherZachariah J Keathley JrMotherSandi Klapp NafzigerSiblings3Alma materRed Oak High SchoolProfessionReality television star, businesswoman, and former banking executiveAmanda Martin's Instagram @mrs.martinbroscustoms

Who is Amanda Martin?

Amanda Martin is a former banking executive, reality television star, and businesswoman. She was born in Red Oak, Texas, United States of America and now lives in Johnson City, Texas, United States of America, with her family. Her nationality is American, and her ethnicity is White.

How old is Amanda Martin?

Amanda Martin's age is 50 years as of August 2024. She was born on 11 December 1973, and her Zodiac sign is Sagittarius.

Family background

The reality television star was born into a family of four children. Her father's name is Zachariah J Keathley Jr. Zachariah was an army veteran who passed away on 1 November 2006.

Her mother's name is Sandi Klapp Nafziger, and her siblings' names are Zach Keathley, Wendi Blank, and Sandra.

Educational background

The reality television star and her siblings went to Red Oak High School. After graduating from high school, she enrolled in an undisclosed institution of higher learning, where she pursued a finance-related course.

Career

After completing her education, the reality television star joined the banking industry, where she worked for a while. She is a former employee of Wells Fargo, a multinational financial company. She worked hard at Wells Fargo and climbed the career ladder to become a branch manager.

She left Wells Fargo after four years and joined Pioneer Bank, where she became a deposit operations vice president. Later she was promoted to the position of Product Manager.

She left employment to focus on personal businesses. She is the co-founder and co-owner of Martin Bros Customs. The company builds, customises, and refurbishes vehicles and motorbikes. Her business partner is her spouse, Joe Martin.

Besides the business, she is a reality TV star best known for starring in Iron Resurrection. The show started airing in 2016 and has continued for seven seasons now.

Is Iron Resurrection still in business?

Yes, the show is still operational. The network has yet to cancel the show.

Is Iron Resurrection coming back in 2024?

Yes, Iron Resurrection started airing its seventh season in 2024. The airing was delayed, causing uneasiness among fans.

Iron Resurrection's Joe and Amanda Martin also sell branded merchandise, including t-shirts, hoodies, and face caps.

Marriage and children

Iron Resurrection's Amanda Martin is married to her business partner, Joe Martin. The couple keeps details of their marriage private. It remains unclear when or how they met.

Iron Resurrection's Amanda Martin's brush with cancer

Amanda Martin has not been diagnosed with cancer, but a close family member has. She often talks about her three nephews. One of them, Luke, was diagnosed with cancer and received treatment at St. Jude Children's Research Hospital.

Luke is doing well now and visits the hospital every three months for check-ups. The family does fundraisers in support of the hospital.

Are Shorty and Joe Martin still friends?

When the fourth season of Iron Resurrection started, fans noticed the absence of Javier "Shorty" Ponce. This aroused speculations that he had broken ties with Joe Martin.

Shorty left the show to focus on his shop and customers in Dallas. He also chose to spend more time with his family. It was revealed that all Iron Resurrection cast members are close friends who support each other's decisions.

What happened to Amanda Martin?

The reality television star temporarily left the cast of Iron Resurrection. Her absence on the show aroused suspicion that she had disagreed with the producers. She did not discuss the matter in public and later returned to the show.

Height and weight

The reality television star is 5 ft 8 in or 173 cm tall, and she weighs about 143 lbs or 65 kg. She has blonde hair and brown eyes.

Trivia

Iron Resurrection's Amanda Martin's measurements are 35-24-33 in.

She loves dogs and is involved in dog rescue missions alongside her family members.

She is a Pitbull advocate.

She runs a cabin AirBnB.

Her ability to handle challenges with a smile on her face is one of her most lovable qualities.

She is an advocate for women in the automotive industry.

Amanda Martin is best known as the girl from Iron Resurrection. The reality television star worked in the banking industry before becoming a businesswoman. She is also a married woman and mother of three.

Tuko.co.ke recently published Love Island's Zara McDermott's biography. McDermott came into the spotlight after her debut on the popular reality show Love Island.

McDermott is a known figure in the British media scene. Her journey in the entertainment world is a thrilling ride from an island villa to the dance floor.
